pages.text: The Trident is a weapon used in both melee and ranged combat. Drowneds may drop it.$(br2)It can be crafted in different ways too: $(li)Kraken Tooths, Prismarine Rod and Heart of Sea $(li)Prismarine Crystals, Heart of Sea and Prismarine Shard$(li)Trasher Tooths amd Prismarine Rods.
